import React from 'react'; import reactDom from "react-dom" import Login from '../accounts/Login'; import Register from '../accounts/Register'; import './LoginModal.css' import { CgClose } from 'react-icons/all' export default function LoginModal({ open, action, onClose, onSubmit}) { use if (!open) return null if (action === "login") { return reactDom.createPortal( <>

New to Reddit? {action="register"; console.log(action)}}>SIGN UP

{console.log(action)}
, document.getElementById('portal') ) } else if (action === "register") { return reactDom.createPortal( <>

Already have an account? action="login"}>Log In

{console.log(action)}
, document.getElementById('portal') ) } }
